channel.title: Crash autorestart
channel.description:
Anyone know all the exceptions that cause server crashes so I could make it auto restart when it crashes?
Or anyone know how to autorestart after a crash in general? I know how to restart I have a command but I'm not sure how to make it do so when the server crashes.
